Look in the MIRROR...
That's your COMPETITION.

BE STRONG

author: TS Eliot
quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far it is possible to go.

author: Howard Schultz, CEO Starbucks
quote: Believe in your dreams and dream big. And then after you’ve done that, dream bigger.

author: John Quincy Adams
quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.

author: Sumner Redstone
quote: Success is not built on success. It’s built on failure. It’s built on frustration. Sometimes its built on catastrophe.

author: Gary Vaynerchuk
quote: Skills are cheap. Passion is priceless.

author: Johnny Depp
quote: I think the thing to do is enjoy the ride while you’re on it.

author: Shaan Ahmed
quote: Sometimes you need to push people into the deep for some people will never learn to swim if they've never been taught how it feels to drown

author: Unknown
quote: No one should have the power to shatter your dreams unless you give it to them.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.

author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe
quote: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.

author: Lance Armstrong
quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.

author: James Joyce
quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.

author: Ellen Goodman
quote: We ought to walk through the rooms of our lives not looking for flaws, but looking for potential.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

author: Chris Grosser
quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.

author: Bruce Feirstein
quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.

author: Lolly Daskal
quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things you give the right things a chance to catch you.

author: John D. Rockefeller
quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

author: Jane Smiley
quote: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.

author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.

author: Francis Chan
quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don’t really matter.

author: George Lorimer
quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction.

author: Mike Gafka
quote: To be successful you must accept all challenges that come your way. You can’t just accept the ones you like.

author: Anatole France
quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.

author: Grace Hopper
quote: A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.

author: Grace Hopper
quote: It is often easier to ask for forgiveness than to ask for permission.

author: Grace Hopper
quote: You don't manage people; you manage things. You lead people.

author: Florence Nightingale
quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

author: Alice Walker
quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

author: Malala Yousafzai
quote: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.

author: Rosa Parks
quote: Knowing what must be done does away with fear.

author: Martha Beck
quote: No matter how difficult and painful it may be, nothing sounds as good to the soul as the truth.

author: Ginni Rometty
quote: Be first and be lonely.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Step out of the history that is holding you back. Step into the new story you are willing to create.

author: Jane Goodall
quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

author: Angela Merkel
quote: A good compromise is one where everybody makes a contribution.

author: Louise Hay
quote: I choose to make the rest of my life the best of my life.

author: Coco Chanel
quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: It’s one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive. Forgive everybody.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

author: Sallie Krawcheck
quote: If you’re not making some notable mistakes along the way, you’re certainly not taking enough business and career chances.

author: Jodie Foster
quote: Normal is not something to aspire to, it’s something to get away from.

author: Todd Anderson
quote: Oh captain, my captain.

author: John Keating
quote: No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.

author: Anonymous
quote: Go ahead. Look out the window. Isn't it a beautiful day?

author: Bob Dylan
quote: People are crazy and times are strange/ I'm locked in tight, I'm out of range/ I used to care, but things have changed.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

author: Anonymous
quote: It's a slow process, but quitting won't speed it up.

author: Anonymous
quote: A river cuts through a rock not because of its power but its persistence.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: The man on top of the mountain didn't fall there.

author: Anonymous
quote: I can and I will. Watch me.

author: Karim Seddiki
quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

author: Steve Martin
quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.

author: Anonymous
quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.

author: Anonymous
quote: Wake up. Kick ass. Repeat.

author: Jon Sinclair
quote: Failure is a bruise, not a tattoo.

author: Wiz Khalifa
quote: Worrying is stupid. It's like walking around with an umbrella waiting for it to rain.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.

author: Anonymous
quote: Go the extra mile -- it's never crowded.

author: Anonymous
quote: Look in the mirror... That's your competition.

author: Freddie Mercury
quote: I won't be a rock star. I will be a legend.

author: Ban Ki-moon
quote: Like the United Nations, there is something inspirational about New York as a great melting pot of different cultures and traditions. And if this is the city that never sleeps, the United Nations works tirelessly, around the clock around the world.

author: Jennifer Lopez
quote: Once you have a lot of success, you become a target in many ways.

author: Woodrow Wilson
quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.

author: Ludwig Quidde
quote: Every success in limiting armaments is a sign that the will to achieve mutual understanding exists, and every such success thus supports the fight for international law and order.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.

author: Roger Babson
quote: Keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.

author: Paula Cole
quote: I'm used to adversity and working really well in difficult situations. It was hard for me to accept the success.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: A constant struggle, a ceaseless battle to bring success from inhospitable surroundings, is the price of all great achievements.

author: Vicente Fox
quote: The real end winner of NAFTA is going to be Mexico because we have the human capital. We have that resource that is vital to the success of the U.S. economy.

author: Al Bernstein
quote: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction.

author: Luke Bryan
quote: A lot of people don't have near the amount of success as I've been blessed to have, and it's all about working hard and hoping that continues.

author: Lucas Grabeel
quote: Success is the most important to many, to me it's just a bonus.

author: Bruno Mars
quote: I think that success is having fun.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

author: Lee Pearson
quote: I'm a gay disabled man who has become very successful. I don't get up in the morning and think I'm inspirational; I just get up thinking that I love horses.

author: Og Mandino
quote: Sound character provides the power with which a person may ride the emergencies of life instead of being overwhelmed by them. Failure is... the highway to success.

author: Albert Camus
quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.

author: Charlie Sheen
quote: As kids we're not taught how to deal with success; we're taught how to deal with failure. If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. If at first you succeed, then what?

author: Henri Frederic Amiel
quote: Everything you need for better future and success has already been written. And guess what? All you have to do is go to the library.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

author: Tracy Chapman
quote: I never assumed I would have that commercial success, so it was a total surprise. And honestly, I never assumed that it would ever happen again.

author: Lionel Messi
quote: You cannot allow your desire to be a winner to be diminished by achieving success before and I believe there is room for improvement in every sportsman.

author: Herbert Kaufman
quote: Failure is only postponed success as long as courage 'coaches' ambition. The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.

author: Colin Morgan
quote: I think anyone who has a passion for what they love to do, and who pursue it, is inspirational for me.

author: Thomas Merton
quote: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.

author: John McDonald
quote: To enjoy enduring success we should travel a little in advance of the world.

author: David Spade
quote: Success? You can't get a big head about it. When people stare at me, they could be whispering to their friend, 'That guy sucks! Have you seen him before? He's horrible.'

author: Robert Schumann
quote: I am so fresh in soul and spirit that life gushes and bubbles around me in a thousand springs.

author: James Dyson
quote: Enjoy failure and learn from it. You can never learn from success.

author: Kathy Ireland
quote: I believe there are three keys to success. For me it is keeping my priorities in order: It's my faith and my family, and then the business.

author: Rupert Murdoch
quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.

author: Michael Bergdahl
quote: Wal-Mart's success strategies and tactics are easy to understand yet hard to duplicate.

author: Morihei Ueshiba
quote: Create each day anew.

author: Thomas J. Watson
quote: You can be discouraged by failure, or you can learn from it. So go ahead and make mistakes, make all you can. Because, remember that's where you'll find success - on the far side of failure.

author: Neill Blomkamp
quote: A lot of America is kind of done. People have been making films about it for 100 years. Everything to me feels used up. But Jo-Burg feels unbelievably inspirational to me.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.

author: Will Smith
quote: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.

author: Henry J. Heinz
quote: To do a common thing uncommonly well brings success.

author: Norman Cousins
quote: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going.

author: Alanis Morissette
quote: It's not just the 'Grammys' that I've pulled out of. I also pulled out of the English awards as well. The reason that I wanted to pull out was because I believe very much that the music industry as a whole is mainly concerned with material success.

author: Martha Stewart
quote: Without an open-minded mind, you can never be a great success.

author: John Wooden
quote: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.

author: Democritus
quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

author: Corita Kent
quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.

author: Felicity Kendal
quote: Success breeds success, and failure leads to a sort of fallow period.

author: Charles Kettering
quote: One fails forward toward success.

author: Jeff Rich
quote: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?

author: Isoroku Yamamoto
quote: In the first six to twelve months of a war with the United States and Great Britain I will run wild and win victory upon victory. But then, if the war continues after that, I have no expectation of success.

author: Bill Copeland
quote: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: It's always too early to quit.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.

author: Donnie Yen
quote: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.

author: Kelli O'Hara
quote: It is such a luxury to open a new book that's highly recommended by friends - either an inspirational yet humorously self-deprecating memoir, or a page-turning piece of fiction.

author: Howard Schultz
quote: The future of America is not an entitlement. We have been given a treasure chest of gifts and opportunities, but some people are being left behind, and success is not sustainable unless it is shared.

author: Ken Hensley
quote: I know why I am here and my only real focused goal is to live each day to the fullest and to try and honor God and be an encouragement to others. What the future holds is firmly in God's hands, and I am very happy about that!

author: Alex Spanos
quote: My greatest success story has been my family.

author: Young Jeezy
quote: I'm a motivational speaker.

author: Arthur C. Brooks
quote: The truth is that relative income is not directly related to happiness. Nonpartisan social-survey data clearly show that the big driver of happiness is earned success: a person's belief that he has created value in his life or the life of others.

author: Michael Korda
quote: Success has always been easy to measure. It is the distance between one's origins and one's final achievement.

author: Woody Hayes
quote: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs.

author: James E. Faust
quote: If there were no night, we would not appreciate the day, nor could we see the stars and the vastness of the heavens. We must partake of the bitter with the sweet. There is a divine purpose in the adversities we encounter every day. They prepare, they purge, they purify, and thus they bless.

author: Henry Norris Russell
quote: Just what future the Designer of the universe has provided for the souls of men I do not know, I cannot prove. But I find that the whole order of Nature confirms my confidence that, if it is not like our noblest hopes and dreams, it will transcend them.

author: Queen Elizabeth II
quote: I know of no single formula for success. But over the years I have observed that some attributes of leadership are universal and are often about finding ways of encouraging people to combine their efforts, their talents, their insights, their enthusiasm and their inspiration to work together.

author: Nader al-Masri
quote: I am very optimistic, and I wish that God almighty grants me success to get a qualifying time. Only then can I go to the Olympics. If this happens I will be the first Palestinian athlete to gain a qualifying time. This will be a big achievement.

author: Richard Rorty
quote: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.

author: Samuel Goldwyn
quote: From success you get a lot of things, but not that great inside thing that love brings you.

author: Leonardo DiCaprio
quote: I realise that I do not change the course of history. I am an actor, I do a movie, that's the end of it. You have to realise we are just clowns for hire. After I had success it was great, at first, not to worry about money. It was on my mind when I was growing up.

author: Michael Dell
quote: There are a lot of things that go into creating success. I don't like to do just the things I like to do. I like to do things that cause the company to succeed. I don't spend a lot of time doing my favorite activities.

author: John Dewey
quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.

author: Soledad O'Brien
quote: There are thousands of inspirational stories waiting to be told about young women who yearn for a great education. They are stories of struggle and stories of success, and they will inspire others to take action and work to change lives.

author: Leslie Moonves
quote: I take great pride in all the tremendous success we've enjoyed at CBS. And the good news is that I feel even more enthusiastic about what my terrific team and I will accomplish going forward.

author: Arthur C. Clarke
quote: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.

author: Sylvester Stallone
quote: I believe there's an inner power that makes winners or losers. And the winners are the ones who really listen to the truth of their hearts.

author: Kevin Brownlow
quote: Silent pictures show us how we lived and what our attitudes were. And as an art form, they can be wonderfully entertaining and often inspirational.

author: Ralph Marston
quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

author: Saint Augustine
quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.

author: Taisen Deshimaru
quote: Think with your whole body.

author: Lenny Kravitz
quote: People always accuse me of being motivational in a way, like it was a bad thing, but that's just how I was raised. My mom raised me in a positive environment, with lots of love in my heart, and that reflects in my music.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: Success is the child of audacity.

author: Mindy Kaling
quote: I try not to put anything political on the forefront of what I'm trying to do creatively. At the same time, I do think it's wonderful when I hear people say that it's inspirational that I'm an Indian woman on camera. My life is very diverse, and my friends are a diverse group of people.

author: Monty Hall
quote: Actually, I'm an overnight success, but it took twenty years.

author: W. Clement Stone
quote: Prayer is man's greatest power!

author: John Burroughs
quote: If you think you can do it, you can.

author: Bo Bennett
quote: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success.

author: William James
quote: Success or failure depends more upon attitude than upon capacity successful men act as though they have accomplished or are enjoying something. Soon it becomes a reality. Act, look, feel successful, conduct yourself accordingly, and you will be amazed at the positive results.

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
quote: We're constantly striving for success, fame and comfort when all we really need to be happy is someone or some thing to be enthusiastic about.

author: K. Flay
quote: Feeling anxious or depressed sometimes is part of what it means to be a person, and it might even be essential to success.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: Success has always been a great liar.

author: Aeschylus
quote: God always strives together with those who strive.

author: Nargis Fakhri
quote: Hard work and dedication is important to success, and I have those qualities.

author: Laurence D. Fink
quote: One of the key elements of human behavior is, humans have a greater fear of loss than enjoyment of success. All the academic studies will show you that the fear of loss of capital is far greater than the enjoyment of gains.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Any fact facing us is not as important as our attitude toward it, for that determines our success or failure. The way you think about a fact may defeat you before you ever do anything about it. You are overcome by the fact because you think you are.

author: Jim Hightower
quote: There's enormous progressive activism and, more often than not, success at the grassroots level - everything from living wage campaigns to efforts to finance our elections are having terrific success.

author: Ron White
quote: If you look at the common denominator of all the comics who have had big success, it's being true to their nature... that's what takes a long time to learn.

author: Han Suyin
quote: There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness.

author: Aristophanes
quote: Let each man exercise the art he knows.

author: Joel Osteen
quote: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Success is dangerous. One begins to copy oneself, and to copy oneself is more dangerous than to copy others. It leads to sterility.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.

author: Anita Roddick
quote: There is no scientific answer for success. You can't define it. You've simply got to live it and do it.

author: John Locke
quote: As people are walking all the time, in the same spot, a path appears.

author: Michael D. Higgins
quote: I hope that at the end of the seven years, people will say that I have been of some inspirational value to them at home in terms of inclusiveness and abroad, I look forward to representing Ireland.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: I firmly believe that unless one has tasted the bitter pill of failure, one cannot aspire enough for success.

author: Graham Greene
quote: Success is more dangerous than failure, the ripples break over a wider coastline.

author: Snoop Dogg
quote: To me, the Seventies were very inspirational and very influential... With my whole persona as Snoop Dogg, as a person, as a rapper. I just love the Seventies style, the way all the players dressed nice, you know, kept their hair looking good, drove sharp cars and they talked real slick.

author: Alan Shepard
quote: I think all of us certainly believed the statistics which said that probably 88% chance of mission success and maybe 96% chance of survival. And we were willing to take those odds.

author: Rose George
quote: What they have done in Japan, which I find so inspirational, is they've brought the toilet out from behind the locked door. They've made it conversational. People go out and upgrade their toilet. They talk about it. They've sanitized it.

author: William Blake
quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.

author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
quote: Real success is not on the stage, but off the stage as a human being, and how you get along with your fellow man.

author: Anne Frank
quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!

author: Josh McDaniels
quote: Of all the things people have taught me regarding life lessons or anything that would benefit me, I don't think anything helped me learn more about life than football. You go through so many different things: adversity, how to handle adversity, how to handle success, how to lead, how to be a teammate, how to communicate.

author: Paloma Picasso
quote: I think, aesthetically, car design is so interesting - the dashboards, the steering wheels, and the beauty of the mechanics. I don't know how any of it works, I don't want to know, but it's inspirational.

author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quote: The first question which the priest and the Levite asked was: 'If I stop to help this man, what will happen to me?' But... the good Samaritan reversed the question: 'If I do not stop to help this man, what will happen to him?'

author: Gertrude Himmelfarb
quote: Nothing is as seductive as the assurance of success.

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
quote: A great social success is a pretty girl who plays her cards as carefully as if she were plain.

author: Howie Mandel
quote: The success of any stand-up act comes out of life experience.

author: Wallis Simpson
quote: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.

author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon
quote: When deeds speak, words are nothing.

author: Jack Nicklaus
quote: Success depends almost entirely on how effectively you learn to manage the game's two ultimate adversaries: the course and yourself.

author: Nargis Fakhri
quote: At the end of the day, the one commonality that both Hindi cinema and Hollywood share is that they are full of talented and inspirational people. Outside of this, there are many differences, from the scheduling and rehearsal to promotion and directing techniques.

author: Junipero Serra
quote: I pray God may preserve your health and life many years.

author: Alan Alda
quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.

author: Henri Matisse
quote: An artist must never be a prisoner. Prisoner? An artist should never be a prisoner of himself, prisoner of style, prisoner of reputation, prisoner of success, etc.

author: James Daly
quote: People say we were an overnight success. It took us a year to be an overnight success.

author: David Cameron
quote: I have no time for those who say there is no way Scotland could go it alone. I know first-hand the contribution Scotland and Scots make to Britain's success - so for me there's no question about whether Scotland could be an independent nation.

author: Ray Kroc
quote: While formal schooling is an important advantage, it is not a guarantee of success nor is its absence a fatal handicap.

author: Pablo Neruda
quote: The books that help you most are those which make you think that most. The hardest way of learning is that of easy reading; but a great book that comes from a great thinker is a ship of thought, deep freighted with truth and beauty.

author: Rahul Dravid
quote: What drew me towards team sport were the camaraderie and friendship. The chance to celebrate victory and success with a group of other people is something I have enjoyed doing.

author: Aeschylus
quote: God loves to help him who strives to help himself.

author: Tony Gwynn
quote: Steroids do not guarantee you're going to have success. I think a lot of people think that they will, but they don't.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.

author: John W. Snow
quote: Telecom is a dramatic success in India and our view is, respecting the political process, and respecting the fact that these are sovereign decisions, is that, approaching India as a friend.

author: Arthur Ashe
quote: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome.

author: Aeschylus
quote: Obedience is the mother of success and is wedded to safety.

author: Gloria Vanderbilt
quote: I've always believed that one woman's success can only help another woman's success.

author: John Burroughs
quote: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.

author: Jack Welch
quote: Before you are a leader, success is all about growing yourself. When you become a leader, success is all about growing others.

author: Gustave Flaubert
quote: Success is a consequence and must not be a goal.

author: Victor Kiam
quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.

author: Earl Nightingale
quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.

author: Robert Collier
quote: Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.

author: Anupam Kher
quote: I started doing motivational tours. I've seen all kinds of people, from the CEOs to the lowest executive, opening up to their fears. We don't introspect as much as we should.

author: Shah Rukh Khan
quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.

author: Sun Tzu
quote: Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack.

author: Confucius
quote: The superior man makes the difficulty to be overcome his first interest; success only comes later.

author: Buddha
quote: What we think, we become.

author: Leo Buscaglia
quote: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded.

author: Omar Epps
quote: I believe success is preparation, because opportunity is going to knock on your door sooner or later but are you prepared to answer that?

author: Niccolo Machiavelli
quote: Whosoever desires constant success must change his conduct with the times.

author: Justin Zackham
quote: One day, I got so disgusted that I sat down and wrote a list called 'Justin's list of things to do before he kicks the bucket.' I wrote it for myself and shortened it to 'Justin's Bucket List.' It was there on the wall, not as a story idea but as a motivational tool for myself, which actually ended up working pretty well.

author: Abraham Joshua Heschel
quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.

author: Sophocles
quote: Who seeks shall find.

author: Ross Perot
quote: Most people give up just when they're about to achieve success. They quit on the one yard line. They give up at the last minute of the game one foot from a winning touchdown.

author: Charlie Gonzalez
quote: After a lifetime of working, raising families, and contributing to the success of this nation in countless other ways, senior citizens deserve to retire with dignity.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Four things for success: work and pray, think and believe.

author: Jerry Lewis
quote: I've had great success being a total idiot.

author: Woody Hayes
quote: Success - it's what you do with what you've got.

author: Tanya Tucker
quote: I don't know what keeps me going. Sometimes I wonder... I think it's just pure perseverance and wanting to succeed and having that burning desire to always have success.

author: Sarah Ban Breathnach
quote: The authentic self is the soul made visible.

author: H. L. Hunt
quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.

author: Molly Ivins
quote: 'Get along, go along' is not an inspirational philosophy, and only God knows how much moral cowardice it has covered up over the years. Serve your time, collect your chits, and cash 'em in for your home state? No, I'd say we could ask for more than that from our senators.

author: Roma Downey
quote: This CD became something of a personal journey for me. The tone of the whole CD is uplifting and inspirational. It's an upper. We have enough downers in the world.

author: Bertrand Russell
quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.

author: Eddie Cantor
quote: It takes 20 years to make an overnight success.

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: I think you can have 10,000 explanations for failure, but no good explanation for success.

author: Aeschylus
quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.

author: Chris Fussell
quote: By providing clear objectives for your team, and setting guardrails for how they get there, you will set them on the path to success.

author: Philip Sidney
quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.

author: Hosea Ballou
quote: Tears of joy are like the summer rain drops pierced by sunbeams.

author: Leonard Cohen
quote: Success is survival.

author: Andre Rieu
quote: I know that when I like music, when it touches my heart, that it will touch your heart, too. That, I think, is the secret to my success.

author: Octavio Paz
quote: Deserve your dream.

author: Andy Grove
quote: Success breeds complacency. Complacency breeds failure. Only the paranoid survive.

author: Edgar Bronfman, Jr.
quote: Commercial success still hasn't come to an artist that isn't signed to a record label. There are very few artists that can succeed without the help of a record label. The role of the record label is still required, it's still necessary.

author: Nicholas Hoult
quote: Other people's success spurs me on to do well and gives me motivation.

author: Richard Branson
quote: A passionate belief in your business and personal objectives can make all the difference between success and failure. If you aren't proud of what you're doing, why should anybody else be?

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.

author: Erwin Rommel
quote: Anyone who has to fight, even with the most modern weapons, against an enemy in complete command of the air, fights like a savage against modern European troops, under the same handicaps and with the same chances of success.

author: Vera Wang
quote: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way.

author: Jimmy Dean
quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.

author: Herbert Spencer
quote: People are beginning to see that the first requisite to success in life is to be a good animal.

author: Akon
quote: Whatever obstacle comes your way, you gotta be prepared to jump over it! And I think that's what separates the legends from the regular artists. It's all in how you manage that success, and how you deal with the controversy when it actually comes.

author: Vanessa Carlton
quote: I have gone from being a 21-year-old with wide eyes to a 24-year-old woman. With success comes a lot of responsibility and power.

author: Ricky Williams
quote: There's more to life than success, and if you can try to be more well-rounded, you'll be able to enjoy your success more. It won't own you or control you.

author: Lily Tomlin
quote: The road to success is always under construction.

author: Mark Warner
quote: My success was due to good luck, hard work, and support and advice from friends and mentors. But most importantly, it depended on me to keep trying after I had failed.

author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
quote: The manic pursuit of success cost me everything I could love: my wife, my three children, some friends I would have liked to grow old with.

author: Wayne Huizenga
quote: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen.

author: Ella Fitzgerald
quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.

author: Ramana Maharshi
quote: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.

author: Dustin Clare
quote: You always draw inspiration from your family or your parents if they've proven to be inspirational. My mother is someone who's always been inspirational to me.

author: Edward Norton
quote: I've always thought of acting as more of an exercise in empathy, which is not to be confused with sympathy. You're trying to get inside a certain emotional reality or motivational reality and try to figure out what that's about so you can represent it.

author: Julie Andrews
quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.

author: Robert Foster Bennett
quote: A desire to be in charge of our own lives, a need for control, is born in each of us. It is essential to our mental health, and our success, that we take control.

author: Bear Bryant
quote: I want to make sure I don't interfere with the success of that team next year. I don't see any way I could go to practice like most of 'em do, and not hurt the team. I'd go nuts if I tried doing that.

author: Arnold H. Glasow
quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.

author: Ron Jaworski
quote: Positive thinking is the key to success in business, education, pro football, anything that you can mention. I go out there thinking that I'm going to complete every pass.

author: Bernard Law Montgomery
quote: Every soldier must know, before he goes into battle, how the little battle he is to fight fits into the larger picture, and how the success of his fighting will influence the battle as a whole.

author: Robin Williams
quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.

author: Thomas J. Stanley
quote: Before you can become a millionaire, you must learn to think like one. You must learn how to motivate yourself to counter fear with courage. Making critical decisions about your career, business, investments and other resources conjures up fear, fear that is part of the process of becoming a financial success.

author: James Mark Baldwin
quote: Feeling is the consciousness of the resulting conditions - of success, failure, equilibrium, compromise or balance, in this continuous rivalry of ideas.

author: Elias Canetti
quote: Success listens only to applause. To all else it is deaf.

author: Bernie Mac
quote: There's no success story. Everybody's got a ghetto story. You always want to make it bigger than what it is.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.

author: Stephen Curry
quote: I've always believed that success for anyone is all about drive, dedication, and desire, but for me, it's also been about confidence and faith.

author: Jim Carrey
quote: I feel like I want to take care of everyone and I also feel this terrible guilt if I am unable to. And I have felt this way ever since all this success started.

author: Danny Thomas
quote: Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.

author: George Lucas
quote: 'Star Wars' is fun, its exciting, its inspirational, and people respond to that. It's what they want.

author: Ireland Baldwin
quote: I want to be an inspirational model. I want people to look at me and say, 'Wow, she looks healthy.'

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
quote: The talent of success is nothing more than doing what you can do well, and doing well whatever you do without thought of fame. If it comes at all it will come because it is deserved, not because it is sought after.

author: Christa McAuliffe
quote: Reach for the stars.

author: Aaron Paul
quote: I saw a lot of people have success handed to them that then exploited it. They didn't protect it or cherish it.

author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
quote: Light tomorrow with today!

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do.

author: Bob Beauprez
quote: Barack Obama likes to point to General Motors as the poster child for the job creation success of his economic policies. However, whatever your sentiments about the government's bailout of General Motors, for every job Barack Obama 'saved-or-created' in the U.S. there were two jobs off shore.

author: Tom Shadyac
quote: I think true success is intrinsic... It's love. It's kindness. It's community.

author: Richard Branson
quote: Treat failure as a lesson on how not to approach achieving a goal, and then use that learning to improve your chances of success when you try again. Failure is only the end if you decide to stop.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.

author: Bradley Whitford
quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.

author: Godfrey Winn
quote: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
quote: The compensation of a very early success is a conviction that life is a romantic matter. In the best sense one stays young.

author: Helen Gurley Brown
quote: My success was not based so much on any great intelligence but on great common sense.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: Success demands singleness of purpose.

author: Fidel Castro
quote: They talk about the failure of socialism but where is the success of capitalism in Africa, Asia and Latin America?

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.

author: Brooke Shields
quote: At Princeton I gained a great deal of pleasure from success in my classes. knowing that I could accomplish those things, and I realized that my success was directly proportionate to the work I put in.

author: Greg Boyle
quote: You stand with the least likely to succeed until success is succeeded by something more valuable: kinship. You stand with the belligerent, the surly and the badly behaved until bad behavior is recognized for the language it is: the vocabulary of the deeply wounded and of those whose burdens are more than they can bear.

author: Anthony Mackie
quote: So I feel like success is opportunity plus preparation, so work begets work, and as long as you're prepared it's going to continue to come your way.

author: Arnold Palmer
quote: Success in golf depends less on strength of body than upon strength of mind and character.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.

author: Samuel Smiles
quote: The battle of life is, in most cases, fought uphill; and to win it without a struggle were perhaps to win it without honor. If there were no difficulties there would be no success; if there were nothing to struggle for, there would be nothing to be achieved.

author: Bill Cosby
quote: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.

author: Michael Jackson
quote: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.

author: Marilyn Ferguson
quote: Achievers have an enabling attitude, realism, and a conviction that they themselves were the laboratory of innovation. Their ability to change themselves is central to their success. They have learned to conserve their energy by minimizing the time spent in regret or complaint. Every event is a lesson to them, every person a teacher.

author: Jean Cocteau
quote: I believe in luck: how else can you explain the success of those you dislike?

author: Michelle Obama
quote: We learned about honesty and integrity - that the truth matters... that you don't take shortcuts or play by your own set of rules... and success doesn't count unless you earn it fair and square.

author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.

author: John D. Rockefeller
quote: I do not think that there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.

author: Yann Arthus-Bertrand
quote: To have success in your professional life is not so hard. To succeed as a man is more difficult.

author: Elbert Hubbard
quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.

author: Michelle Phan
quote: Every video I've made has an inspirational message behind it. Since day one, I thought, 'Okay, I want my audience to be, like, Disney members.' So if that's the case, I have to keep everything rated G.

author: Natalie Gulbis
quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.

author: Elias Canetti
quote: Success is the space one occupies in the newspaper. Success is one day's insolence.

author: Joan of Arc
quote: I am not afraid... I was born to do this.

author: Carly Schroeder
quote: I think that's a great opportunity, to pick a script where you can build up a good skill. I think the main thing I look for when I look at scripts is if it's inspirational. If it's something that teenagers can relate to. And is it something that the audience is going to get something out of. If not, then it's really not worth doing.

author: Simon Mainwaring
quote: Refuse to accept the belief that your professional relevance, career success or financial security turns on the next update on the latest technology. Sometimes it's good to put the paddle down and just let the canoe glide.

author: Booker T. Washington
quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.

author: William Hazlitt
quote: The more we do, the more we can do.

author: Malcolm X
quote: If you have no critics you'll likely have no success.

author: Nick Saban
quote: Teachers are always trying to inspire people to do better, to learn, to grow. That's what we do, and we're proud of the success we've had here doing that, and it's something we'll certainly continue to do.

author: Chuck Norris
quote: People need to realise what real happiness and success is, because success as an actor is fleeting. You can be up there one day and gone the next.

author: Donald Johanson
quote: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.

author: Ted Turner
quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.

author: John P. Kotter
quote: Great leaders understand that historical success tends to produce stable and inwardly focused organizations, and these outfits, in turn, reinforce a feeling of contentment with the status quo.

author: Pope John XXIII
quote: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

author: Naveen Jain
quote: Successful entrepreneurs find the balance between listening to their inner voice and staying persistent in driving for success - because sometimes success is waiting right across from the transitional bump that's disguised as failure.

author: George Michael
quote: I knew, regardless of anything else, singing in front of an orchestra was going to be inspirational. It would feed me.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: No man ever achieved worth-while success who did not, at one time or other, find himself with at least one foot hanging well over the brink of failure.

author: Thomas Fuller
quote: Great hopes make great men.

author: Stephen Colbert
quote: I used to make up stuff in my bio all the time, that I used to be a professional ice-skater and stuff like that. I found it so inspirational. Why not make myself cooler than I am?

author: John Ruskin
quote: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.

author: Cristiano Ronaldo
quote: There are people out there who hate me and who say I'm arrogant, vain, and whatever. That's all part of my success. I am made to be the best.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

author: Epictetus
quote: Only the educated are free.

author: Pope Paul VI
quote: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.

author: Aisha Tyler
quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.

author: Stephen Covey
quote: An empowered organisation is one in which individuals have the knowledge, skill, desire, and opportunity to personally succeed in a way that leads to collective organisational success.

author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: Success is not greedy, as people think, but insignificant. That is why it satisfies nobody.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you're in control of your life. If you don't, life controls you.

author: Sophocles
quote: There is no success without hardship.

author: Jean-Claude Van Damme
quote: I came to America with a dream and I made it. The dream became reality. America is built for success.

author: Walter Chrysler
quote: The real secret of success is enthusiasm.

author: John C. Maxwell
quote: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda.

author: Ben Bernanke
quote: It's the price of success: people start to think you're omnipotent.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.

author: Arianna Huffington
quote: We need to accept that we won't always make the right decisions, that we'll screw up royally sometimes - understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.

author: Harper Lee
quote: I never expected any sort of success with 'Mockingbird'... I sort of hoped someone would like it enough to give me encouragement.

author: Thomas Paine
quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.

author: Al Capp
quote: Success is following the pattern of life one enjoys most.

author: Mark Skousen
quote: Taxation is the price we pay for failing to build a civilized society. The higher the tax level, the greater the failure. A centrally planned totalitarian state represents a complete defeat for the civilized world, while a totally voluntary society represents its ultimate success.

author: Nido Qubein
quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.

author: Aristotle
quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

author: Denis Waitley
quote: Time is the most precious element of human existence. The successful person knows how to put energy into time and how to draw success from time.

author: Zac Hanson
quote: It's cool to have critical success because it's always nice for your peers to say, 'Good job.' But who cares about them?

author: Michelangelo
quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!

author: Christopher Morley
quote: Act like you expect to get into the end zone.

author: David McCullough
quote: Real success is finding you lifework in the work that you love.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.

author: Marlee Matlin
quote: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.

author: Johann Sebastian Bach
quote: I was obliged to be industrious. Whoever is equally industrious will succeed equally well.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

author: George S. Patton
quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.

author: Maria Bartiromo
quote: I think that my biggest attribute to any success that I have had is hard work. There really is no substitute for working hard.

author: Kevin Bacon
quote: Part of being a man is learning to take responsibility for your successes and for your failures. You can't go blaming others or being jealous. Seeing somebody else's success as your failure is a cancerous way to live.

author: William Bartram
quote: On the recollection of so many and great favours and blessings, I now, with a high sense of gratitude, presume to offer up my sincere thanks to the Almighty, the Creator and Preserver.

author: Malcolm Forbes
quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.

author: Edmund Hillary
quote: Good planning is important. I've also regarded a sense of humor as one of the most important things on a big expedition. When you're in a difficult or dangerous situation, or when you're depressed about the chances of success, someone who can make you laugh eases the tension.

author: Gwen Stefani
quote: The one thing that makes me feel super lucky about my financial success is that I have a housekeeper.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
quote: Every man's life is a fairy tale written by God's fingers.

author: Wiz Khalifa
quote: I always envisioned myself being a rapper and being in the game and having success, but you never know what it feels like or how you're going to be when you're there.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.

author: Tom Kite
quote: Fear comes in two packages fear of failure, and sometimes, fear of success.

author: Joyce Brothers
quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.

author: Sam Ewing
quote: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it.

author: Meg Whitman
quote: You look at the tremendous success of Facebook. To my mind there is not a lot of commerce going on in these social networking sites. eBay is a community anchored in commerce. It is a commerce site that built a community around it. What has not been proven is if the reverse can happen and people will go to community sites to do commerce.

author: H. G. Wells
quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

author: Bo Bennett
quote: When it comes to success, there are no shortcuts.

author: Lydia M. Child
quote: Belief in oneself is one of the most important bricks in building any successful venture.

author: Douglas MacArthur
quote: There is no substitute for victory.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: A will finds a way.

author: Swami Vivekananda
quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.

author: Louisa May Alcott
quote: Have regular hours for work and play; make each day both useful and pleasant, and prove that you understand the worth of time by employing it well. Then youth will be delightful, old age will bring few regrets, and life will become a beautiful success.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.

author: Paul Bryant
quote: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.

author: Tony Dungy
quote: The secret to success is good leadership, and good leadership is all about making the lives of your team members or workers better.

author: Jim Carrey
quote: If you've got a talent, protect it.

author: James E. Casey
quote: One measure of your success will be the degree to which you build up others who work with you. While building up others, you will build up yourself.

author: Bill Owens
quote: True leadership lies in guiding others to success. In ensuring that everyone is performing at their best, doing the work they are pledged to do and doing it well.

author: Jack Welch
quote: You've got to eat while you dream. You've got to deliver on short-range commitments, while you develop a long-range strategy and vision and implement it. The success of doing both. Walking and chewing gum if you will. Getting it done in the short-range, and delivering a long-range plan, and executing on that.

author: Larry King
quote: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves.

author: Lil Wayne
quote: I'm an addict, I'm addicted to success. Thankfully, there's no rehab for success.

author: Ellen Ochoa
quote: We are constantly emphasizing to people that they need to address anything that affects flight safety or mission success - many pathways to do that. We need to understand better what may be preventing people from using those pathways.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: It is not the going out of port, but the coming in, that determines the success of a voyage.

author: Jessica Savitch
quote: I worked half my life to be an overnight success, and still it took me by surprise.

author: Henry Rollins
quote: I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.

author: Henry Drummond
quote: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.

author: Cardinal Richelieu
quote: Carry on any enterprise as if all future success depended on it.

author: Edward Young
quote: Too low they build, who build beneath the stars.

author: Alia Bhatt
quote: I think the success that I have is due to hard work and destiny. It is important to stay grounded and not take things for granted.

author: Marilyn Monroe
quote: Success makes so many people hate you. I wish it wasn't that way. It would be wonderful to enjoy success without seeing envy in the eyes of those around you.

author: Ben Sweetland
quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.

author: Cheryl Crawford
quote: Lee's great gifts are teaching and inspirational guidance, not administration and management.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.

author: Dale Turner
quote: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.

author: Johnny Depp
quote: You grow up a bit damaged or broken then you have some success but you don't know how to feel good about the work you're doing or the life you're leading.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.

author: Maysoon Zayid
quote: I'm not here to impose Sharia law, and I'm not here to have a message about disability being inspirational - I'm here to make people laugh. But when I can layer things and make people not only laugh but question, make people not only laugh but be offended... I have to do that.

author: Soichiro Honda
quote: Success represents the 1% of your work which results from the 99% that is called failure.

author: Amos Bronson Alcott
quote: Success is sweet and sweeter if long delayed and gotten through many struggles and defeats.

author: Eddie Redmayne
quote: As an actor there's a lot of scrutiny and, even when you've had success, it becomes about sustaining that success. A friend of mine described it as a peakless mountain. Even for De Niro there's Pacino and for Pacino there's De Niro.

author: Donald Cargill
quote: And now, this is the sweetest and most glorious day that ever my eyes did see.

author: Nikki Sixx
quote: Traveling around the country, meeting fans and hearing their stories in person and on my radio show has reenergized my commitment to creating honest and inspirational content that not only serves my own creative purposes but can help and touch others as well.

author: Peter Finch
quote: Success is not two cars or a swimming pool. It's the approval of your peers.

author: Oliver Herford
quote: Many are called but few get up.

author: Don Rickles
quote: Whatever you do to gain success, you have to hang in there and hope good things happen. Always think positive.

author: Steve Berry
quote: A concerted effort to preserve our heritage is a vital link to our cultural, educational, aesthetic, inspirational, and economic legacies - all of the things that quite literally make us who we are.

author: Morihei Ueshiba
quote: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quote: The success I have achieved in bodybuilding, motion pictures, and business would not have been possible without the generosity of the American people and the freedom here to pursue your dreams.

author: Pope Paul VI
quote: Of all human activities, man's listening to God is the supreme act of his reasoning and will.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: There's a way to do it better - find it.

author: Mario Andretti
quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.

author: Brian Tracy
quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.

author: Imran Amed
quote: Although he's no longer with us, Steve Jobs is still inspirational to me, as he managed to find the balance between right brain/left-brain thinking that is crucial to building a creative technology business.

author: William Arthur Ward
quote: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.

author: Simone Weil
quote: I can, therefore I am.

author: J. R. Martinez
quote: I'm going to write a book, continue acting, continue motivational speaking and just share with people who I am and what I've learned in my second chance of life and pass it on to people in their first chance of life.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: In this world it is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich.

author: Travis Bradberry
quote: When you're working hard and doing all you can to achieve your goals, anything that can give you an edge is powerful and will streamline your path to success.

author: Alexander Graham Bell
quote: The most successful men in the end are those whose success is the result of steady accretion.

author: Black Elk
quote: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning.

author: John Caudwell
quote: Business gives you a massive high. Doing a great deal, coming up with an inspirational solution... It's very addictive. But it doesn't last long. In isolation, it's a bit sterile. It doesn't reward the soul.

author: Ella Baker
quote: Give light and people will find the way.

author: Henry Van Dyke
quote: There is a loftier ambition than merely to stand high in the world. It is to stoop down and lift mankind a little higher.

author: Taylor Kinney
quote: I look up to a strong woman; maybe that's why I fell for Gaga. She works incredibly hard and is very strong and inspirational like Mom, with a great work ethic.

author: Bernard Williams
quote: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit.

author: David Joseph Schwartz
quote: The success combination in business is: Do what you do better... and: do more of what you do.

author: Tyga
quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you do, you'll be successful.

author: Charles Luckman
quote: Success is that old ABC - ability, breaks, and courage.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: That man is a success who has lived well, laughed often and loved much.

author: Malala Yousafzai
quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.

author: Celine Dion
quote: The hardest thing to find in life is balance - especially, the more success you have, the more you look to the other side of the gate.

author: Osric Chau
quote: I do like alternative rock and rap, but as far as inspirational, then I go full-on orchestra. It fills up your entire being.

author: Mikhail Bakunin
quote: Such a faith would be fatal to my reason, to my liberty, and even to the success of my undertakings; it would immediately transform me into a stupid slave, an instrument of the will and interests of others.

author: Wesley Clark
quote: When Bill Clinton ran in '92, and I listened to him, and I had of course known of his record from Arkansas, I found him extraordinarily inspirational, and I voted Democratic.

author: Martina Navratilova
quote: I've a great family, two children to take care of. Then, of course, I do commentary for TV. I do speak about various women's issues around the world - like LGBT, motivational speeches. I have a lot on my plate right now. But eventually, yes, I would like to pass on the knowledge and something that I would like to do.

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
quote: However things may seem, no evil thing is success and no good thing is failure.

author: Bill Cosby
quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.

author: Tennessee Williams
quote: Luxury is the wolf at the door and its fangs are the vanities and conceits germinated by success. When an artist learns this, he knows where the danger is.

author: Lisa Morton
quote: Some say I'm an overnight success. Well, that was a very long night that lasted about 10 years.

author: Paramahansa Yogananda
quote: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.

author: Jonathan Taylor Thomas
quote: Success is not in never failing, but rising everytime you fall!

author: Colin Kaepernick
quote: The NFL is a performance-based business, so you should have to perform to earn some of your money. At the same time, I realize that my success isn't just because of what I do out there.

author: Matthew Henry
quote: After a storm comes a calm.

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quote: Failure is not an option. Everyone has to succeed.

author: Rose Leslie
quote: It is so inspirational, to see that in the world of Westeros, men are answering to women, and they are a force to be reckoned with. It's empowering, and it's inspirational as well, because you're just like, 'This is great!'

author: Leonardo DiCaprio
quote: I've been very lucky to have achieved a lot of the things that I dreamt of achieving as a young man. But, at the end of the day - and I truly believe this - it is not about achieving great wealth or success. Because they don't bring happiness, ultimately.

author: Peter James
quote: There are people who can achieve huge success in life, while adding a bit of fun and a splash of colour to this increasingly grey world.

author: Christopher Reeve
quote: Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.

author: Catherine Zeta-Jones
quote: For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end.

author: Wiz Khalifa
quote: I have an idea of who I want to be, I have a vision of my own success.

author: Dee Hock
quote: Success follows those adept at preserving the substance of the past by clothing it in the forms of the future.

author: Richard Gere
quote: The secret of my success is my hairspray.

author: Diane Sawyer
quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.

author: Peter Guber
quote: Beside every great success are the seeds of enormous failure. In every failure, there's the opportunity seeds of great success. They're not miles apart. So if they're that close together, and if you're really working, you're always gonna have that likelihood that something's not going to work.

author: Mary Kay Ash
quote: People fall forward to success.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: I wonder how many times people give up just before a breakthrough - when they are on the very brink of success.

author: Sheryl Sandberg

author: Tony Robbins
quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

author: Ursula Burns
quote: As I've progressed in my career, I've come to appreciate - and really value - the other attributes that define a company's success beyond the P&L: great leadership, long-term financial strength, ethical business practices, evolving business strategies, sound governance, powerful brands, values-based decision-making.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: Winning isn't everything, it's the only thing.

author: Walter Scott
quote: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities.

author: Angie Stone
quote: 'Do What You Gotta Do' is a positive, inspirational song that says no matter what it is; whether you're up against challenges or trying to get your dreams and aspirations met, you should do what whatever you have to do shy of killing yourself or someone else.

author: Juliana Hatfield
quote: If you want to achieve things in life, you've just got to do them, and if you're talented and smart, you'll succeed.

author: David Frost
quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.

author: Stella Young

author: Fulton J. Sheen
quote: Show me your hands. Do they have scars from giving? Show me your feet. Are they wounded in service? Show me your heart. Have you left a place for divine love?

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire. This is your moment. Own it.

author: David Attenborough
quote: Many individuals are doing what they can. But real success can only come if there is a change in our societies and in our economics and in our politics.

author: James Cash Penney
quote: Success cannot come from standstill men. Methods change and men must change with them.

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is liking what you get.

author: Michelle Obama

author: W. Clement Stone

author: George Herbert
quote: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.

author: Georgia O'Keeffe

author: Charlotte Whitton
quote: When one must, one can.

author: Muhammad Ali
quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'

author: Elisabeth Shue
quote: I don't think 'Cocktail' was a perfect critical success, but it touched a vein in our culture.

author: David Joseph Schwartz
quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.

author: Smokey Robinson
quote: So I wanted to sing inspirational music, and that's exactly how I approached it - only the words have been changed to declare my relationship with God.

author: Buddha
quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.

author: Margaret Mead
quote: I must admit that I personally measure success in terms of the contributions an individual makes to her or his fellow human beings.

author: Travis Bradberry
quote: More than half of people who leave their jobs do so because of their relationship with their boss. Smart companies make certain their managers know how to balance being professional with being human. These are the bosses who celebrate an employee's success, empathize with those going through hard times, and challenge people, even when it hurts.

author: W. Somerset Maugham
quote: The common idea that success spoils people by making them vain, egotistic and self-complacent is erroneous; on the contrary it makes them, for the most part, humble, tolerant and kind.

author: David O. Selznick
quote: The success of a production depends on the attention paid to detail.

author: Anna Pavlova
quote: When a small child, I thought that success spelled happiness. I was wrong, happiness is like a butterfly which appears and delights us for one brief moment, but soon flits away.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.

author: Anna Pavlova
quote: To follow, without halt, one aim: that's the secret of success.

author: Chris Brown
quote: I would say I'm an inspirational guidelines book. You can take my life story or scenarios or songs and relate to them and apply them to your everyday life.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.

author: Philip Guedalla
quote: Greatness is so often a courteous synonym for great success.

author: Matt Cameron
quote: No matter how much success you're having, you can't continue working together if you can't communicate.

author: Elbert Hubbard
quote: Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it.

author: Gabrielle Aplin
quote: I am never without my lyric book. If anything inspirational happens, I have it there so nothing's forgotten.

author: Harsha Bhogle
quote: In sports teams, apart from talk of sporting prowess and the imparting of inspirational thought, an extraordinary amount of time is spent discussing, and flaunting, material possessions.

author: Larry Ellison
quote: I have had all of the disadvantages required for success.

author: Helen Rowland
quote: You will never win if you never begin.

author: Jack Nicholson
quote: I sort of understood that when I first started: that you shouldn't repeat a success. Very often you're going to, and maybe the first time you do, it works. And you love it. But then you're trapped.

author: Azim Premji
quote: People are the key to success or extraordinary success.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: There's no abiding success without commitment.

author: Dwayne Johnson
quote: Check your ego at the door. The ego can be the great success inhibitor. It can kill opportunities, and it can kill success.

author: Smokey Robinson
quote: In fact, I wouldn't really call this a Gospel album, I call it more an inspirational album.

author: George C. Marshall
quote: Don't fight the problem, decide it.

author: John W. Gardner
quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.

author: Ken Venturi
quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.

author: Woody Allen
quote: Seventy percent of success in life is showing up.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

author: Phillips Brooks
quote: The ideal life is in our blood and never will be still.

author: Colin Powell
quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

author: Jean Cocteau
quote: The reward of art is not fame or success but intoxication: that is why so many bad artists are unable to give it up.

author: Satya Nadella
quote: We've had great successes, but our future is not about our past success. It's going to be about whether we will invent things that are really going to drive our future.

author: Thomas Jefferson

author: Maria Montessori
quote: The greatest sign of success for a teacher... is to be able to say, 'The children are now working as if I did not exist.'

author: Elbert Hubbard
quote: He has achieved success who has worked well, laughed often, and loved much.

author: James Wolfe

author: Adam Beach
