quote: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars.

author: Hassanal Bolkiah
quote: Future peace, prosperity and confidence depend not just on ourselves but on the success of all nations. Hence, we are all partners, no matter what our backgrounds, cultures, faiths and histories.

author: Bo Bennett
quote: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success.

author: Christa McAuliffe
quote: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.

author: Amy Waldman
quote: Religious speech is extreme, emotional, and motivational. It is anti-literal, relying on metaphor, allusion, and other rhetorical devices, and it assumes knowledge within a community of believers.

author: Max Lerner
quote: Despite the success cult, men are most deeply moved not by the reaching of the goal but by the grandness of the effort involved in getting there - or failing to get there.

author: Taylor Dayne
quote: My tastes and inspirational artists were always rather eclectic and diverse.

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: If a man has been his mother's undisputed darling he retains throughout life the triumphant feeling, the confidence in success, which not seldom brings actual success along with it.

author: Lucy Larcom
quote: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.

author: Sydney Madwed
quote: If you want to be truly successful invest in yourself to get the knowledge you need to find your unique factor. When you find it and focus on it and persevere your success will blossom.

author: William J. H. Boetcker
quote: Your success depends mainly upon what you think of yourself and whether you believe in yourself.

author: Om Puri
quote: I had hoped when my life was chronicled, it would be an inspirational story.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.

author: Steve Garvey
quote: We all obviously need others to look up to, and be inspirational to us. Ford did a great job as far as putting the presidency back where it belonged, getting the trust back after Nixon. And President Reagan has been one of the most influential presidents.

author: Robert Frost
quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.

author: Montel Williams
quote: My first book was called, 'Mountain, Get Out of My Way,' where I did an autobiographical sketch, if you will, looking back at myself and looking back at things in my life, and juxtaposing them against things that are happening in other people's lives and trying to be motivational.

author: Anne Frank
quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.

author: Ronald Reagan
quote: We should measure welfare's success by how many people leave welfare, not by how many are added.

author: Russell Baker
quote: Roosevelt's declaration that Americans had 'nothing to fear but fear itself' was a glorious piece of inspirational rhetoric and just as gloriously wrong.

author: Nolan Ryan
quote: Enjoying success requires the ability to adapt. Only by being open to change will you have a true opportunity to get the most from your talent.

author: Lord Byron
quote: 'Tis pleasant, sure, to see one's name in print. A book's a book, although there's nothing in 't.

author: William Ellery Channing
quote: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration.

author: Robert Baden-Powell
quote: Success in training the boy depends largely on the Scoutmaster's own personal example.

author: Prince Royce
quote: When I was working at the Sprint store, I got laid off. I was bummed out, but I stayed positive. I used the money I had earned while working there to make my first album. Without that job, maybe 'Corazon Sin Cara' would never had been made. It's a very inspirational story.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Applause waits on success.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy.

author: Felix Dennis
quote: Good ideas are like Nike sports shoes. They may facilitate success for an athlete who possesses them, but on their own they are nothing but an overpriced pair of sneakers. Sports shoes don't win races. Athletes do.

author: Lauren Bacall
quote: I am not a has-been. I am a will be.

author: Carl Sandburg
quote: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.

author: Warren Buffett
quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.

author: Vincent McNabb
quote: Hope is some extraordinary spiritual grace that God gives us to control our fears, not to oust them.

author: Rafe Spall
quote: Being kind is the most important thing I've ever been taught. That's what my parents always told me - more important than ambition or success is being kind to people. The cornerstone of my life. What I aspire to is to be kind.

author: Hassanal Bolkiah
quote: The development of our human resources is an area in which we need to do well as it is decisive in determining the success of our diversification programme.

author: Joseph Campbell
quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.

author: Charles Atlas
quote: Step by step and the thing is done.

author: Dan Millman
quote: I learned that we can do anything, but we can't do everything... at least not at the same time. So think of your priorities not in terms of what activities you do, but when you do them. Timing is everything.

author: Alan Watts
quote: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.

author: J. Paul Getty
quote: How does one measure the success of a museum?

author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

author: Shiv Khera
quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.

author: Elmer Bernstein
quote: One of the things that happens in the business is that success is a very strange thing in that if you are involved in something very successful the next person wants you to repeat it.

author: Victoria Principal
quote: Success doesn't mean that you are healthy, success doesn't mean that you're happy, success doesn't mean that you're rested. Success really doesn't mean that you look good, or feel good, or are good.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: Tell me, why is the media here so negative? Why are we in India so embarrassed to recognise our own strengths, our achievements? We are such a great nation. We have so many amazing success stories but we refuse to acknowledge them. Why?

author: Soichiro Honda
quote: Success is 99 percent failure.

author: Bill Gates
quote: Well I think any author or musician is anxious to have legitimate sales of their products, partly so they're rewarded for their success, partly so they can go on and do new things.

author: Warren Buffett
quote: Basically, when you get to my age, you'll really measure your success in life by how many of the people you want to have love you actually do love you.

author: Octavia E. Butler
quote: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.

author: Elizabeth Taylor
quote: Success is a great deodorant.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: You might well remember that nothing can bring you success but yourself.

author: Tennessee Williams
quote: Success and failure are equally disastrous.

author: Tyron Woodley
quote: What's on my playlist when I'm fighting is not so much hip-hop. Sometimes, it's something more inspirational. I get a chance to think about what I'm fighting for, like, my family. It takes me to that state because a lot of times, it's a spiritual warfare for me.

author: Helen Sharman
quote: The government will see that human spaceflight is useful - for science and the economy - and inspirational.

author: Roger Staubach
quote: Nothing good comes in life or athletics unless a lot of hard work has preceded the effort. Only temporary success is achieved by taking short cuts.

author: Ashley Olsen
quote: We've stayed really normal and down to Earth I think, and haven't let the success thing go to our head.

author: Walter Scott
quote: Success - keeping your mind awake and your desire asleep.

author: Nikki Bella
quote: I want to build a legacy at the WWE, but I definitely want to continue to grow the Bella Empire. I want it to go beyond the ring. I would love to be a motivational speaker.

author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.

author: Johnny Carson
quote: My success just evolved from working hard at the business at hand each day.

author: Paul Sweeney
quote: True success is overcoming the fear of being unsuccessful.

author: Martin Seligman
quote: There are physical characteristics which are inherited. These include things like good looks, high intelligence, physical coordination. These attributes contribute to success in life, and success in life is a determinant of optimism.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Part of the secret of a success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Before success comes in any man's life, he's sure to meet with much temporary defeat and, perhaps some failures. When defeat overtakes a man, the easiest and the most logical thing to do is to quit. That's exactly what the majority of men do.

author: George Washington Carver
quote: It is not the style of clothes one wears, neither the kind of automobile one drives, nor the amount of money one has in the bank, that counts. These mean nothing. It is simply service that measures success.

author: Harvey Mackay
quote: It doesn't matter whether you are pursuing success in business, sports, the arts, or life in general: The bridge between wishing and accomplishing is discipline.

author: Jose Mourinho
quote: Money does not guarantee success.

author: Mindy Kaling
quote: I feel lucky because I was a nerd, which I talk about in the book, but I had academic success, so through that, because that's what my parents put a great deal of value on, I had a great childhood because I sort of fulfilled the expectations of being good at school.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: Israel was not created in order to disappear - Israel will endure and flourish. It is the child of hope and the home of the brave. It can neither be broken by adversity nor demoralized by success. It carries the shield of democracy and it honors the sword of freedom.

author: Brian Tracy
quote: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.

author: Chris Hadfield
quote: Ultimately, leadership is not about glorious crowning acts. It's about keeping your team focused on a goal and motivated to do their best to achieve it, especially when the stakes are high and the consequences really matter. It is about laying the groundwork for others' success, and then standing back and letting them shine.

author: Edsger Dijkstra
quote: Elegance is not a dispensable luxury but a factor that decides between success and failure.

author: Noel Gallagher
quote: In business, you can have one massive success that earns $50 million overnight, and that's it. You're successful. End of story. But in the music business, you have to keep on doing it.

author: Arthur Ashe
quote: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.

author: David Chipperfield
quote: If you look at a building by Mies van der Rohe, it might look very simple, but up close, the sheer quality of construction, materials and thought are inspirational.

author: Judy Collins
quote: I think people who are creative are the luckiest people on earth. I know that there are no shortcuts, but you must keep your faith in something Greater than You, and keep doing what you love. Do what you love, and you will find the way to get it out to the world.

author: Steven Bauer
quote: I'm very fond of the British cinema. I'm a big fan of Martin Campbell and Daniel Craig. I actually find Daniel very inspirational, especially on the physical side of things. He really inspired me to get back into shape when I started to add on a few pounds. I think he's a great role model.

author: Gordon Ramsay
quote: I suppose your security is your success and your key to success is your fine palate.

author: Jean Giraudoux
quote: The secret of success is sincerity.

author: Ben Shapiro
quote: In actuality, California could be a wonderful place to live. In fact, if you're highly educated and ambitious, you can do quite well here while enjoying the sun and the fun. The only problem: California will then blame you for your success and recommend that all your cash be removed from you.

author: Adrien Brody
quote: My dad told me, 'It takes fifteen years to be an overnight success', and it took me seventeen and a half years.

author: Vladimir Nabokov
quote: The breaking of a wave cannot explain the whole sea.

author: Sylvia Plath
quote: Go out and do something. It isn’t your room that’s a prison, it’s yourself.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: A man sees in the world what he carries in his heart.

author: Banksy
quote: Nobody knows what you feel inside unless you tell them.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
quote: Do it or don’t do it — you will regret both.

author: Juan Gabriel Vásquez
quote: The saddest thing that can happen to a person is to find out their memories are lies.

author: Shinji Moon
quote: You are beautiful because you let yourself feel, and that is a brave thing indeed.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.

author: Elvis Presley
quote: People think you’re crazy if you talk about things they don’t understand.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: You are not free until you have no need to impress anybody.

author: Haruki Murakami
quote: Whatever it is you’re seeking won’t come in the form you’re expecting.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Don’t be afraid. There are exquisite things in store for you. This is merely the beginning.

author: Mike McHargue
quote: People grow when they are loved well. If you want to help others heal, love them without an agenda.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: The truth is rarely pure and never simple.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: People do not seem to realise that their opinion of the world is also a confession of their character.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: We are all broken, that’s how the light gets in.

author: Katherine Henson
quote: Having a soft heart in a cruel world is courage, not weakness.

author: John Steinbeck
quote: It’s so much darker when a light goes out than it would have been if it had never shone.

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: Don’t allow your wounds to turn you into a person you are not.

author: Hellen Keller
quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

author: Michael Atshuler
quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.

author: Plato
quote: A work well begun is half-ended.

author: Jacob Riis
quote: When nothing seems to help, I go and look at a stonecutter hammering away at his rock, perhaps a hundred times without as much as a crack showing in it. Yet at the hundred and first blow it will split in two, and I know it was not that last blow that did it, but all that had gone before.

author: Edwin Markham
quote: We have committed the Golden Rule to memory; let us now commit it to life.

author: Mary Kay Ash
quote: Ideas are a dime a dozen. People who implement them are priceless.

author: Robert Greenleaf
quote: Purpose and laughter are the twins that must not separate. Each is empty without the other.

author: Woody Hayes
quote: The only thing even in this world is the number of hours in a day. The difference in winning or losing is what you do with those hours.

author: Tim Connor
quote: Life offers no guarantees... just choices; no certainty... but consequences; no predictable outcomes... just the privilege of pursuit.

author: Helen Keller
quote: No pessimist ever discovered the secret of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new doorway for the human spirit.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

author: Unknown
quote: The dream is free. The hustle is sold separately.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.

author: Marissa Mayer
quote: I always did something I was a little not ready to do. I think that’s how you grow. When there’s that moment of, ‘Wow, I’m not really sure I can do this,’ and you push through those moments, that’s when you have a breakthrough.

author: Patti Smith
quote: Never let go of that fiery sadness called desire.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Challenges are gifts that force us to search for a new center of gravity. Don’t fight them. Just find a new way to stand.

author: Sheryl Sandberg
quote: What would you do if you weren’t afraid?

author: Muhammad Ali
quote: I don’t count my sit-ups; I only start counting when it starts hurting because they’re the only ones that count.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: One, remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Two, never give up work. Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it. Three, if you are lucky enough to find love, remember it is there and don’t throw it away.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

author: Thomas Edison
quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: John Wooden
quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

author: Arthur Ashe
quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

author: Jimi Hendrix
quote: Music doesn’t lie. If there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music.

author: Eric Clapton
quote: When all the original blues guys are gone, you start to realize that someone has to tend to the tradition. I recognize that I have some responsibility to keep the music alive, and it’s a pretty honorable position to be in.

author: B.B. King
quote: A guitar is like an old friend that is there with me.

author: Leonard Bernstein
quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.

author: Gustav Mahler
quote: I am hitting my head against the walls, but the walls are giving way.

author: John Cage
quote: I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones.

author: Richard Wagner
quote: Imagination creates reality.

author: Patti Smith
quote: Please, no matter how we advance technologically, please don't abandon the book. There is nothing in our material world more beautiful than the book.

author: Jimi Hendrix
quote: Music is my religion.

author: Heraclitus
quote: There is nothing permanent except change.

author: Democritus
quote: Nothing exists except atoms and empty space; everything else is just opinion.

author: Michael Jordan

With your mind power, your determination, your instinct, and the experience as well, you can fly very high.

If you can’t fly, then run.
If you can’t run, then walk. If you can’t walk, then crawl.
Today we will survive.

author: Edward Elric ('Fullmetal Alchemist')
quote:
You'll have to decide for yourself.
Walk on your own. Move forward.
You've got a strong pair of legs. You should get up and use them.

author: Roy Mustang ('Fullmetal Alchemist')
quote: If you believe the possibility exists, then you should do whatever it takes.

author: Greed ('Fullmetal Alchemist')
quote: There’s no such thing as 'no such thing.'

author: Akito Takagi ('Bakuman')
quote: If I follow my dream and it shatters—I can accept having to regret that. But I don't want to regret not pursuing it in the first place.

author: Rukia Kuchiki ('Bleach')
quote: Even if no one believes in you, stick out your chest and scream your defiance!

author: All Might ('My Hero Academia')
quote:
If you feel yourself hitting up against your limit, remember for what cause you clench your fists.
Remember why you started down this path, and let that memory carry you beyond your limit.

author: Yato ('Noragami')
quote:
To put things simply, if your past makes your present, then your present can and will make your future.
When you think about it that way, you absolutely have the potential to be anything you want to be.

author: Saitama ('One-Punch Man')
quote:
You said you worked hard?
Well, maybe you need to work a little bit longer.

author: Mikoto Misaka ('A Certain Magical Index')
quote: Someone places a hurdle in front of me and I can't rest until I've jumped over it.

author: Genji Kamogawa ('Hajime no Ippo')
quote: Run until you can't run anymore, and then run again. Constant effort is life's greatest shortcut.

author: B.A.P ('Do What I Feel')
quote:
When you care about what other people think, you start wasting precious time.
Just do it; what are you afraid of?

author: Metabee ('Medabots')
quote:
You can do anything you put your mind to. 
You shouldn't have to second-guess your every move just because of one little mistake.
You have the same abilities you've always had.

author: Naruto Uzumaki ('Naruto')
quote:
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it.
Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be!

author: Sora ('No Game No Life')
quote: Life is not a game of luck. If you wanna win, work hard.

author: Archer ('Fate/stay night')
quote: What you must imagine is always that you, yourself, are the strongest.

author: Shiroe ('Log Horizon')
quote:
If you can't do something, then don't.
Focus on what you can do.

author: Seiya Kanie ('Amagi Brilliant Park')
quote: If you wanna make people dream, you've gotta start by believing in that dream yourself!

author: Inuyasha ('Inuyasha')
quote: You've got two legs and a heartbeat. What's stopping you?

author: Shinichi Chiaki ('Nodame Cantabile')
quote: You can't sit around envying other people's worlds. You have to go out and change your own.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: You can have everything you want in life if you just help enough people get what they want in life.

author: Gandhi
quote: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.

author: E. E. Cummings
quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.

author: Washington Irving
quote: Great minds have great purposes, others have wishes. Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.

author: Don Shula
quote: The start is what stops most people.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you desing for the present.

author: Louis C.K
quote: As long as you think your past is bad you must be improving

author: Unknown
quote: It's okay to have a bad day

author: Jim Rohn
quote: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.

author: Unknown
quote: A ship in the harbor is safe. But that's not what ships are for.

author: Unknown
quote: You have survived every single bad day so far

author: Kevin Smith
quote: Please pay attention very carefully, because this is the truest thing a stranger will ever say to you: In the face of such hopelessness as our eventual, unavoidable death, there is little sense in not at least TRYING to accomplish all your wildest dreams in life.

author: Patch Adams
quote: At the age of 18, I made up my mind to never have another bad day in my life. I dove into a endless sea of gratitude from which I've never emerged.

author: Elon Musk
quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

author: Unknown
quote:
Look in the MIRROR...
That's your COMPETITION.

author: Unknown
quote:
BE STRONG
You never know who you are inspiring

author: Joseph Sugarman
quote: The greatest success stories were created by people who recognized a problem & turned it into an opportunity.

author: Anthony Saleh
quote: I never wake up today with yesterday's problems.

author: Winston Churchill
quote:
If you're going through hell,
KEEP GOING.

author: Unknown
quote: Fear stops people from accomplishing their goals.

author: Pat Waldron
quote: The boundary between what can be and your life, is your ideas

author: Will Smith
quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.

author: Unknown
quote:
There are three rules.
1. If you do not go after what you want, you will never have it.
2. If you do not ask, the answer will always be no.
3. If you do not step forward, you will remain in the same place.

author: Asim Premji
quote: If people are not laughing at your goals, your goals are too small

author: Charles D Gill
quote: There are many wonderful things that will never be done if you do not do them.

author: Dr. Suess
quote: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
quote: It's never too late to be whoever you want to be. I hope you live a life you're proud of, And if you find that you're not, I hope you have the strength to start over.

author: Unknown
quote: Just because you took longer than others, doesn’t mean you failed.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint', then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.

author: Muhammad Ali
quote: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth

author: Ziad K. Abdelnour
quote: One of the hardest decision you'll ever face in life is choosing whether to walk away or try harder.

author: Unknown
quote: Don't worry if people don't like you. Most people are struggling to like themselves.

author: Lori Deschene
quote: Note to self: Keep going. You’re doing great. You might not be where you want to be yet, but that’s okay. Just take it one step at a time and keep believing in yourself. And remember: No matter what happens, you can still enjoy your life and be happy.

author: Scudder N. Parker
quote: People have a way of becoming what you encourage them to be, not what you nag them to be.

author: Edward Everett Hale
quote: I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do.

author: Barbara Baron
quote: Don’t wait for your feelings to change to take the action. Take the action and your feelings will change.

author: Robert H. Schuller
quote: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.

author: Francis Bacon Sr.
quote: Begin doing what you want to do now. We are not living in eternity. We have only this moment, sparkling like a star in our hand-and melting like a snowflake.

author: Unknown
quote: Always concentrate on how far you’ve come, rather than how far you have left to go.

author: Will Rogers
quote: Half our life is spent trying to find something to do with the time we have rushed through life trying to save.

author: Proverb
quote: It is better to take many small steps in the right direction than to make a great leap forward only to stumble backward.

author: William James
quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

author: H. Jackson Browne
quote: Don’t be afraid to go out on a limb. That’s where the fruit is.

author: William Penn
quote: To have striven, to have made the effort, to have been true to certain ideals–this alone is worth the struggle.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.

author: Daisaku Ikeda
quote: What matters is the value we’ve created in our lives, the people we’ve made happy and how much we’ve grown as people.

author: Unknown
quote: A diamond is just a piece of charcoal that handled stress exceptionally well.

author: Henri L. Bergson
quote: Think like a man of action; act like a man of thought.

author: Chinese Proverb
quote: If you get up one more time than you fall, you will make it through

author: Buddha
quote: He is able who thinks he is able.

author: Buddha
quote: No matter how hard the past, you can always begin again.

author: Einstein
quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.

author: Unknown
quote: Excellence can be obtained if you care more than others think is wise, risk more than others think is safe, dream more than others think is practical, expect more than others think is possible.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t fear failure so much that you refuse to try new things. The saddest summary of life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.

author: Proverb
quote: From small beginnings come great things.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems; be led by your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: More powerful than the will to win is the courage to begin.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

author: Pema Chodron
quote: Fear is a natural reaction to moving closer to the truth.

author: Unknown
quote: Commitment in the face of conflict produces character.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t let today’s disappointments cast a shadow on tomorrow’s dreams.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them

author: Bruce Lee
quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done

author: Bruce Lee
quote: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower

author: Lori Deschene
quote: Don’t give up just because things get hard. Give up if you feel in your gut that moving on is the right choice for you.

author: Lori Deschene
quote: Life isn’t always fair. Some people are born into better environments. Some people have better genetics. Some are in the right place at the right time. If you’re trying to change your life, all of this is irrelevant. All that matters is that you accept where you are, figure out where you want to be, and then do what you can, today and every day, to hold your head high and keep moving forward.

author: Joshua Graham
quote: I survived because the fire inside me burned brighter than the fire around me.

author: Earl Nightingale
quote: Don’t let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it.

author: Ashley Hodgeson
quote: The strongest people aren’t always the people who win, but the people who don’t give up when they lose.

author: Christine Mason Miller
quote: At any given moment, you have the power to say: This is not how the story is going to end.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Life’s blows cannot break a person whose spirit is warmed by the fire of enthusiasm.

author: Dr. David Schwartz
quote: When you believe something can be done, really believe, your mind will find ways to do it.

author: Mark Victor Hansen
quote: Your belief determines your action and your action determines your results, but first you have to believe.

author: James Joyce
quote: A man’s errors are his portals of discovery.

author: David Starr Jordan
quote: Wisdom is knowing what to do next, skill is knowing how to do it, and virtue is doing it.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn’t have the power to say yes.

author: Maori Proverb
quote: Turn your face toward the sun and the shadows will fall behind you.

author: Unknown
quote: Doing your best means never stop trying.

author: Unknown
quote: A hard fall means a high bounce…if you’re made of the right material.

author: Unknown
quote: People who urge you to be realistic generally want you to accept their version of reality.

author: Proverb
quote: If we are facing in the right direction, all we have to do is keep on walking.

author: Bernice Johnson Reagon
quote: Life’s challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they’re supposed to help you discover who you are.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: I cannot make my days longer so I strive to make them better.

author: Unknown
quote: We all have problems. The way we solve them is what makes us different.

author: Oswald Avery
quote: Whenever you fall, pick something up.

author: Proverb
quote: Care and diligence bring luck.

author: Unknown
quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the road…unless you fail to make the turn.

author: Unknown
quote: Stop being afraid of what could go wrong, and start being excited about what could go right.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: What is not started today is never finished tomorrow.

author: Unknown
quote: You can do what’s reasonable or you can decide what’s possible.

author: Daisaku Ikeda
quote: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.

author: Thomas Edison
quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time

author: Mark Twain
quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first

author: Walt Disney
quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths

author: Walt Whitman
quote: Nothing exterior to me will ever take command of me.

author: Alexander The Great
quote: Nothing is impossible to him who will try.

author: Frederick Douglas
quote: If there are no struggles, there is no progress.

author: Aristotle
quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

author: Unknown
quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.

author: John Wooden
quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.

author: Unknown
quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.

author: Unknown
quote: Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it's safe or certain.

author: Swami Vivekananda
quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life--think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Unknown
quote: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them.

author: Unknown
quote: If you do what you always did, you will get what you always got.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

author: Proverb
quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly.

author: Unknown
quote: Successful entrepreneurs are givers and not takers of positive energy.

author: Vaibhav Shah
quote: Whenever you see a successful person you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.

author: Chris Grosser
quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

author: Kim Garst
quote: If you don't value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talents--start charging for it.

author: David Brinkley
quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

author: Henry Ford
quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.

author: Unknown
quote: You learn more from failure than from success. Don’t let it stop you. Failure builds character.

author: Unknown
quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.

author: Unknown
quote: Don't raise your voice, improve your argument.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.

author: Unknown
quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.

author: Bruce Feirstein
quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.

author: Lolly Daskal
quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.

author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.

author: Unknown
quote: Blessed are those who can give without remembering and take without forgetting.

author: Unknown
quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.

author: Unknown
quote: What's the point of being alive if you don't at least try to do something remarkable.

author: Lolly Daskal
quote: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

author: Unknown
quote: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.

author: Unknown
quote: Knowledge is being aware of what you can do. Wisdom is knowing when not to do it.

author: Unknown
quote: Your problem isn't the problem. Your reaction is the problem.

author: Unknown
quote: You can do anything, but not everything.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.

author: Ray Goforth
quote: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed.

author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
quote: Thinking should become your capital asset, no matter whatever ups and downs you come across in your life.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.

author: Robert Collier
quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.

author: Thomas J. Watson
quote: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.

author: Michael John Bobak
quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.

author: Philippos
quote: You may only succeed if you desire succeeding; you may only fail if you do not mind failing.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear--not absence of fear.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing--that's why we recommend it daily.

author: Earl Nightingale
quote: We become what we think about most of the time, and that's the strangest secret.

author: Vidal Sassoon
quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

author: Les Brown
quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

author: Martha Stewart
quote: I find that when you have a real interest in life and a curious life, that sleep is not the most important thing.

author: Unknown
quote: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.

author: Colin R. Davis
quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.

author: Ralph Nader
quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.

author: Bill Gates
quote: As we look ahead into the next century, leaders will be those who empower others.

author: Henry Kravis
quote: A real entrepreneur is somebody who has no safety net underneath them.

author: Mark Caine
quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed, and the more they find a way to succeed. Similarly, when someone is failing, the tendency is to get on a downward spiral that can even become a self-fulfilling prophecy.

author: Audre Lorde
quote: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.

author: Bruce Lee
quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

author: Roger Staubach
quote: There is no traffic jam along the extra mile.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.

author: Gurbaksh Chahal
quote: If you genuinely want something, don't wait for it--teach yourself to be impatient.

author: Robert Kiyosaki
quote: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.

author: T. Harv Eker
quote: If you want to make a permanent change, stop focusing on the size of your problems and start focusing on the size of you!

author: Steve Jobs
quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something--your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.

author: Robert Frost
quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I  took the one less traveled by, and that made all the difference.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: The number one reason people fail in life is because they listen to their friends, family, and neighbors.

author: Denis Waitley
quote: The reason most people never reach their goals is that they don't define them, or ever seriously consider them as believable or achievable. Winners can tell you where they are going, what they plan to do along the way, and who will be sharing the adventure with them.

author: Jane Smiley
quote: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.

author: Diane Ackerman
quote: I don't want to get to the end of my life and find that I lived just the length of it. I want to have lived the width of it as well.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.

author: Jim Ryun
quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.

author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.

author: Francis Chan
quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter.

author: George Lorimer
quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.

author: Bruce Lee

author: John C. Maxwell
quote: Success is ... knowing your purpose in life, growing to reach your maximum potential, and sowing seeds that benefit others.

author: Wayne Dyer

author: Anatole France
quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no help at all.

author: Booker T. Washington
quote: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you had to overcome to reach your goals.

author: Theodore N. Vail
quote: Real difficulties can be overcome; it is only the imaginary ones that are unconquerable.

author: Herman Melville
quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.

author: Spencer Johnson
quote: What would you do if you weren't afraid.

author: Washington Irving
quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above it.

author: Truman Capote
quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.

author: John R. Wooden
quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

author: Margaret Thatcher
quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: A man can be as great as he wants to be. If you believe in yourself and have the courage, the determination, the dedication, the competitive drive and if you are willing to sacrifice the little things in life and pay the price for the things that are worthwhile, it can be done.

author: Helen Keller
quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

author: Kevin Kruse
quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

author: Robert Frost
quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.

author: Florence Nightingale
quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.

author: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

author: Babe Ruth
quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.

author: W. Clement Stone
quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.

author: Kevin Krus
quote: We must balance conspicuous consumption with conscious capitalism.

author: John Lennon
quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.

author: Earl Nightingale
quote: We become what we think about.

author: Alice Walker
quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.

author: Buddha
quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

author: Chinese Proverb
quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

author: Socrates
quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.

author: Woody Allen
quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.

author: Seneca
quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.

author: Seneca
quote: There is no easy way from the earth to the stars

author: Seneca
quote: It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.

author: Viktor Frankl
quote: What man actually needs is not a tensionless state but rather the striving and struggling for some goal worthy of him.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: If you find something very difficult to achieve yourself, don't imagine it impossible-for anything possible and proper for another person can be achieved as easily by you.

author: Epictetus
quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: To be like the rock that the waves keep crashing over. It stands unmoved and the raging of the sea falls still around it.

author: Seneca
quote: Many are harmed by fear itself, and many may have come to their fate while dreading fate

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: If it’s endurable, then endure it. Stop complaining.

author: Seneca
quote: To bear trials with a calm mind robs misfortune of its strength and burden.

author: Epictetus
quote: If you would be a good reader, read; if a writer, write.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: ...but if a thing is humanly possible, consider it to be within your reach.

author: Epictetus
quote: How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself

author: Seneca
quote: Fire tries gold, misfortune tries brave men.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: True good fortune is what you make for yourself. Good fortune: good character, good intentions, good actions.

author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.

author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: There is nothing so stable as change.

author: Shaan Ahmed
quote: You can't play life like an untuned instrument and then ask why the music is unpleasent.

author: Tupac Shakur
quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.

author: Big K.R.I.T.
quote: Just know that I was once considered just a dreamer... Then I paid my dues and turned so many doubters to believers...

author: Fetty Wap
quote: Don't let nobody tell you that you can't do it. Love what you do until you don't love it anymore. Nothing's impossible.

author: Tony A. Gaskins Jr.
quote: If you don't build your dream someone will hire you to help build theirs.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying.

author: TS Eliot
quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far it is possible to go.

author: Howard Schultz, CEO Starbucks
quote: Believe in your dreams and dream big. And then after you’ve done that, dream bigger.

author: John Quincy Adams
quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.

author: Sumner Redstone
quote: Success is not built on success. It’s built on failure. It’s built on frustration. Sometimes its built on catastrophe.

author: Gary Vaynerchuk
quote: Skills are cheap. Passion is priceless.

author: Johnny Depp
quote: I think the thing to do is enjoy the ride while you’re on it.

author: Shaan Ahmed
quote: Sometimes you need to push people into the deep for some people will never learn to swim if they've never been taught how it feels to drown

author: Unknown
quote: No one should have the power to shatter your dreams unless you give it to them.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.

author: Lance Armstrong
quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.

author: James Joyce
quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.

author: Ellen Goodman
quote: We ought to walk through the rooms of our lives not looking for flaws, but looking for potential.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.

author: Chris Grosser
quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.

author: Bruce Feirstein
quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.

author: Lolly Daskal
quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things you give the right things a chance to catch you.

author: John D. Rockefeller
quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

author: Jane Smiley
quote: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.

author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.

author: Francis Chan
quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don’t really matter.

author: George Lorimer
quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction.

author: Mike Gafka
quote: To be successful you must accept all challenges that come your way. You can’t just accept the ones you like.

author: Grace Hopper
quote: A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.

author: Grace Hopper
quote: It is often easier to ask for forgiveness than to ask for permission.

author: Grace Hopper
quote: You don't manage people; you manage things. You lead people.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

author: Martha Beck
quote: No matter how difficult and painful it may be, nothing sounds as good to the soul as the truth.

author: Ginni Rometty
quote: Be first and be lonely.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Step out of the history that is holding you back. Step into the new story you are willing to create.

author: Jane Goodall
quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

author: Angela Merkel
quote: A good compromise is one where everybody makes a contribution.

author: Louise Hay
quote: I choose to make the rest of my life the best of my life.

author: Coco Chanel
quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: It’s one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive. Forgive everybody.

author: Sallie Krawcheck
quote: If you’re not making some notable mistakes along the way, you’re certainly not taking enough business and career chances.

author: Jodie Foster
quote: Normal is not something to aspire to, it’s something to get away from.

author: Todd Anderson
quote: Oh captain, my captain.

author: John Keating
quote: No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.

author: Anonymous
quote: Go ahead. Look out the window. Isn't it a beautiful day?

author: Bob Dylan
quote: People are crazy and times are strange/ I'm locked in tight, I'm out of range/ I used to care, but things have changed.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

author: Anonymous
quote: It's a slow process, but quitting won't speed it up.

author: Anonymous
quote: A river cuts through a rock not because of its power but its persistence.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: The man on top of the mountain didn't fall there.

author: Anonymous
quote: I can and I will. Watch me.

author: Karim Seddiki
quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

author: Steve Martin
quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.

author: Anonymous
quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.

author: Anonymous
quote: Wake up. Kick ass. Repeat.

author: Jon Sinclair
quote: Failure is a bruise, not a tattoo.

author: Wiz Khalifa
quote: Worrying is stupid. It's like walking around with an umbrella waiting for it to rain.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.

author: Anonymous
quote: Go the extra mile -- it's never crowded.

author: Anonymous
quote: Look in the mirror... That's your competition.

author: Freddie Mercury
quote: I won't be a rock star. I will be a legend.

author: Ban Ki-moon
quote: Like the United Nations, there is something inspirational about New York as a great melting pot of different cultures and traditions. And if this is the city that never sleeps, the United Nations works tirelessly, around the clock around the world.

author: Jennifer Lopez
quote: Once you have a lot of success, you become a target in many ways.

author: Woodrow Wilson
quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.

author: Ludwig Quidde
quote: Every success in limiting armaments is a sign that the will to achieve mutual understanding exists, and every such success thus supports the fight for international law and order.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.

author: Roger Babson
quote: Keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.

author: Paula Cole
quote: I'm used to adversity and working really well in difficult situations. It was hard for me to accept the success.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: A constant struggle, a ceaseless battle to bring success from inhospitable surroundings, is the price of all great achievements.

author: Vicente Fox
quote: The real end winner of NAFTA is going to be Mexico because we have the human capital. We have that resource that is vital to the success of the U.S. economy.

author: Al Bernstein
quote: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction.

author: Luke Bryan
quote: A lot of people don't have near the amount of success as I've been blessed to have, and it's all about working hard and hoping that continues.

author: Lucas Grabeel
quote: Success is the most important to many, to me it's just a bonus.

author: Bruno Mars
quote: I think that success is having fun.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

author: Lee Pearson
quote: I'm a gay disabled man who has become very successful. I don't get up in the morning and think I'm inspirational; I just get up thinking that I love horses.

author: Og Mandino
quote: Sound character provides the power with which a person may ride the emergencies of life instead of being overwhelmed by them. Failure is... the highway to success.

author: Albert Camus
quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.

author: Charlie Sheen
quote: As kids we're not taught how to deal with success; we're taught how to deal with failure. If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. If at first you succeed, then what?

author: Henri Frederic Amiel
quote: Everything you need for better future and success has already been written. And guess what? All you have to do is go to the library.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

author: Tracy Chapman
quote: I never assumed I would have that commercial success, so it was a total surprise. And honestly, I never assumed that it would ever happen again.

author: Lionel Messi
quote: You cannot allow your desire to be a winner to be diminished by achieving success before and I believe there is room for improvement in every sportsman.

author: Herbert Kaufman
quote: Failure is only postponed success as long as courage 'coaches' ambition. The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.

author: Colin Morgan
quote: I think anyone who has a passion for what they love to do, and who pursue it, is inspirational for me.

author: Thomas Merton
quote: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.

author: John McDonald
quote: To enjoy enduring success we should travel a little in advance of the world.

author: David Spade
quote: Success? You can't get a big head about it. When people stare at me, they could be whispering to their friend, 'That guy sucks! Have you seen him before? He's horrible.'

author: Robert Schumann
quote: I am so fresh in soul and spirit that life gushes and bubbles around me in a thousand springs.

author: James Dyson
quote: Enjoy failure and learn from it. You can never learn from success.

author: Kathy Ireland
quote: I believe there are three keys to success. For me it is keeping my priorities in order: It's my faith and my family, and then the business.

author: Rupert Murdoch
quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.

author: Michael Bergdahl
quote: Wal-Mart's success strategies and tactics are easy to understand yet hard to duplicate.

author: Morihei Ueshiba
quote: Create each day anew.

author: Thomas J. Watson
quote: You can be discouraged by failure, or you can learn from it. So go ahead and make mistakes, make all you can. Because, remember that's where you'll find success - on the far side of failure.

author: Neill Blomkamp
quote: A lot of America is kind of done. People have been making films about it for 100 years. Everything to me feels used up. But Jo-Burg feels unbelievably inspirational to me.

author: Orison Swett Marden
quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.

author: Will Smith
quote: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.

author: Henry J. Heinz
quote: To do a common thing uncommonly well brings success.

author: Norman Cousins
quote: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going.

author: Alanis Morissette
quote: It's not just the 'Grammys' that I've pulled out of. I also pulled out of the English awards as well. The reason that I wanted to pull out was because I believe very much that the music industry as a whole is mainly concerned with material success.

author: Martha Stewart
quote: Without an open-minded mind, you can never be a great success.

author: John Wooden
quote: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.

author: Democritus
quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

author: Corita Kent
quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.

author: Felicity Kendal
quote: Success breeds success, and failure leads to a sort of fallow period.

author: Charles Kettering
quote: One fails forward toward success.

author: Jeff Rich
quote: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?

author: Isoroku Yamamoto
quote: In the first six to twelve months of a war with the United States and Great Britain I will run wild and win victory upon victory. But then, if the war continues after that, I have no expectation of success.

author: Bill Copeland
quote: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: It's always too early to quit.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.

author: Donnie Yen
quote: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.

author: Kelli O'Hara
quote: It is such a luxury to open a new book that's highly recommended by friends - either an inspirational yet humorously self-deprecating memoir, or a page-turning piece of fiction.

author: Howard Schultz
quote: The future of America is not an entitlement. We have been given a treasure chest of gifts and opportunities, but some people are being left behind, and success is not sustainable unless it is shared.

author: Ken Hensley
quote: I know why I am here and my only real focused goal is to live each day to the fullest and to try and honor God and be an encouragement to others. What the future holds is firmly in God's hands, and I am very happy about that!

author: Alex Spanos
quote: My greatest success story has been my family.

author: Young Jeezy
quote: I'm a motivational speaker.

author: Arthur C. Brooks
quote: The truth is that relative income is not directly related to happiness. Nonpartisan social-survey data clearly show that the big driver of happiness is earned success: a person's belief that he has created value in his life or the life of others.

author: Michael Korda
quote: Success has always been easy to measure. It is the distance between one's origins and one's final achievement.

author: Woody Hayes
quote: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs.

author: James E. Faust
quote: If there were no night, we would not appreciate the day, nor could we see the stars and the vastness of the heavens. We must partake of the bitter with the sweet. There is a divine purpose in the adversities we encounter every day. They prepare, they purge, they purify, and thus they bless.

author: Henry Norris Russell
quote: Just what future the Designer of the universe has provided for the souls of men I do not know, I cannot prove. But I find that the whole order of Nature confirms my confidence that, if it is not like our noblest hopes and dreams, it will transcend them.

author: Queen Elizabeth II
quote: I know of no single formula for success. But over the years I have observed that some attributes of leadership are universal and are often about finding ways of encouraging people to combine their efforts, their talents, their insights, their enthusiasm and their inspiration to work together.

author: Nader al-Masri
quote: I am very optimistic, and I wish that God almighty grants me success to get a qualifying time. Only then can I go to the Olympics. If this happens I will be the first Palestinian athlete to gain a qualifying time. This will be a big achievement.

author: Richard Rorty
quote: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.

author: Samuel Goldwyn
quote: From success you get a lot of things, but not that great inside thing that love brings you.

author: Leonardo DiCaprio
quote: I realise that I do not change the course of history. I am an actor, I do a movie, that's the end of it. You have to realise we are just clowns for hire. After I had success it was great, at first, not to worry about money. It was on my mind when I was growing up.

author: Michael Dell
quote: There are a lot of things that go into creating success. I don't like to do just the things I like to do. I like to do things that cause the company to succeed. I don't spend a lot of time doing my favorite activities.

author: John Dewey
quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.

author: Soledad O'Brien

author: Leslie Moonves
